name: Full Queue Developer
items: Featured in [iOS Dev Weekly](https://iosdevweekly.com/issues/563#tools)!

name: Daring Bit Assembly

name: Stash

iOS developr ependency management using Mint, Cocoapods, & Xcodegen

name: GrowFlow
capacity: Consultant with Dan Ramteke Consulting Inc & TopTal.com
items: Embedded GrowFlow's existing webapp into a `WKWebView` with native login screen
Coordinated on-device capabilities such as BlueTooth and local storage to enable their React webapp to connect and reconnect to receipt and label printers.
Integrated native Zebra and Star Micronics SDKs to print over BlueTooth, USB, and WiFi from iPad.
Converted PDFs to native CoreGraphics bitmaps to print receipts and package labels

name: Stash
capacity: Consultant with Dan Ramteke Consulting Inc.
items: Took ownership of investigating a launch bug that involved AppsFlyer and concurrent threads which resulted in potential 10 second launch times. The fix I architected resulted in a 10% increase in registrations.
Aided with Braze, Mixpanel, Apptimize, AppsFlyer, and Branch integrations.
Migrated from Branch to AppsFlyer
